articles.title: Archegos' Bill Hwang sentenced to 18 years in prison for massive US fraud - Reuters
articles.description: Former billionaire investor Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang was sentenced to 18 years in prison on Wednesday over the collapse of Archegos Capital Management, which cost Wall Street banks more than $10 billion.
